body:
Wassup!
I am looking for a cheap-ish screen recorder for Xbox and PC.
It needs to work with both, as i do not want to have to buy two.
I was wondering if the wonderful Avicus community could help me out
I am going to start doing vids with me and my friend BadassPurple

Thx, hope someone can help

title: Screen Rec! (Sorry to ask again)

replies.body:
Do you have a capture card?

For PC use DxTory it is $50 I think
replies.body_tagged:
Do you have a capture card?

For PC use DxTory it is $50 I think

replies.body: for xbox you need a pvr i think. They are like 50 - 300 dollars.. for pc though i would use fraps.
replies.body_tagged: for xbox you need a pvr i think. They are like 50 - 300 dollars.. for pc though i would use fraps.

replies.body: you don't even have to buy fraps u can just use a friends account
replies.body_tagged: you don't even have to buy fraps u can just use a friends account

replies.body: Hmmm, I was hoping I could do it with one program, anyone rise have ideas?
